```ts
"scripts": {
 "\n========== Building ==========": "",
 "build": "npm run clean && tsc",
 "watch": "tsc --watch",
 "clean": "shx rm -rf ./dist/*",
 "\n========== Testing ==========": "",
 "test": "mocha --enable-source-maps --ui qunit",
 "testall": "mocha --enable-source-maps --ui qunit \"./dist/**/*_test.js\"",
 "\n========== Publishing ==========": "",
 "publishd": "npm publish --dry-run",
 "prepublishOnly": "npm run build"
},

```
